PHRASE.LANG: The iconic digital watch was as much a symbol of the 8-bit era as bad hair and screaming ‘owww!!!’ in pop songs. [#Legal]
La montre digitale est à la période 8 bits ce que les coupes de cheveux ratées et les "oooooohhh!!!" sont à la pop. [#Legal]
Die kultige Digitaluhr war ebenso Sinnbild der 8-Bit-Ära wie hässliche Föhnfrisuren und das „Owww!!!“-Geheul in Popsongs. [#Legal]
L'iconico orologio digitale era un simbolo dell'era degli 8-bit come i capelli cotonati e le grida "owww!!!" nelle canzoni pop. [#Legal]
El icónico reloj digital fue un símbolo de la era de los 8 bits, tanto como lo fueron los pelucones y los grititos en las canciones pop. [#Legal]
The iconic digital watch was as much a symbol of the 8-bit era as bad hair and screaming ‘owww!!!’ in pop songs. [#Legal]
